details.title: Interaction of 80S rat liver ribosome with lipid monolayers studied by electron microscopy
details.abstract: The adsorption of 80S ribosorre from rat on the surface of was examined monolayers was exam ned by the electron microscopy (EM) using a negative staining method. The results showed that a large nurrber of ribosomes were adsorbed on the lipid merrbrane surfaces containing positiviely charged SA (octadecylamine), while few ribosomes were observed on surfaces of neutral or negatively charged lipid monolayers. The monolayers. The interaction of ribosome with positively charged monolayers was affected by the composition and ratio of the membrane lipids, and by the ionic strength and pH value of the subphase buffer. The results suggest that ribosome should be adsorbed on the membrane surface through electrostatic force.
